attributes.action: Make clothing companies print children CPR instructions inside children's vests
attributes.background: You never know when you need to perform CPR on your child, it could save their life if someone didn't know how to do it but was in that position.

rejection.details:
This would be the responsibility of clothing manufacturers, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could start a new petition calling on the Government to require CPR instructions to be available in public buildings if that is something you would like to see happen.
